about_the_game:
A Winter Polaris Drama CD released at Winter Comiket 97. Provided free as a gift to all Winter Polaris and Stage-nana fans.

Learn about the origins of Tsubaki, the nature of immortality, and the Rainy World in this drama CD.

Fully voiced in Japanese, with a fully translated English/Japanese Script included with the audio files.
Contains references and mild spoilers to the other game in the Polaris universe: Ame no Marginal - Rain Marginal -
